## Telegram Channel
To inform you about the important announcements related to the course on time, an announcement channel is created in the [Telegram](https://telegram.org/) app. The detailed information can be found on documents below.  

- [Telegram Channel Announcement](`r paste0(economics.path, "CE/Economics_Telegram Channel Announcement_Info.pdf")`) `r emo::ji(eng)`
- [QR Code - For Phones](`r paste0(economics.path, "CE/Economics_Telegram Channel Announcement_Flyer.pdf")`) `r emo::ji(eng)`
